snippet: Michael Wright, who has worked at Turner Broadcasting for the last 14 years, will succeed Stacey Snider as chief executive.
abstract: DreamWorks Studios announces that Turner Broadcasting veteran Michael Wright will replace Stacey Snider as chief executive.
lead_paragraph: Michael Wright, who has worked at Turner Broadcasting for the last 14 years, will succeed Stacey Snider as chief executive.

headline.main: DreamWorks Chooses Chief From Ranks of Television
headline.print_headline: DreamWorks Chooses Chief From Ranks of Television
